name: Elijan Mamut
arrest_reason_suspected: Ethnicity, travel abroad, supporting daughters studying abroad
summary: Elijan's daughter suspects that he has been subjected to forced labour. As far as she knows, he was in good health at the time he went missing.
personal_details: Elijan is very active and loves the outdoors. He is also a keen gardener. It was a tradition for him to spend time with his family every Sunday.

name: Mahira Yakub
arrest_reason_official: Giving material support to terrorist activity
arrest_reason_suspected: Transferring money to parents in Australia
summary: Since November 2020, Mayila has been held in the Yining detention centre for having transferred money to her parents in Australia in 2013. She has no access to her family or a lawyer of her choice. According to the family member Amnesty International interviewed, the money was intended for her parents to buy a house. In February 2021, the Chinese authorities confirmed Mayila’s sentence to be six years and six months, but it is unclear whether Mahira was granted a fair trial. They have also confiscated her earnings. Before being detained in prison, Mahira was held in a “re-education” camp from March to December 2018, where she suffered from liver damage for which she was transferred to a hospital for three months. It is unclear whether she needs to take medications and, if so, whether she can access adequate medical treatment while in prison.
personal_details: Mahira is a hard-working single mother who loved spending time with her children. Despite having three jobs to ensure an adequate income for the family, Mahira always managed to have some free time for her kids so that she could teach them the importance of diversity and family values. They also loved reading books and watching TV series together.

name: Hayrigul Niyaz
summary:
“The 27 October 2015 was the last time we saw each other in Turkey at the airport”, said her brother when interviewed by Amnesty International. Around June/July 2017 his sister Hayrigul was detained by the Chinese authorities and taken from Urumqi to Toksu. It is unclear if now she is in a “re-education” camp or in a prison. According to her brother, she is detained for having travelled and studied abroad. It appears that she has no access to a lawyer and the Chinese authorities have not provided any official documents about her status.

In April 2020, hoping to receive information about his sister, her brother spoke to some family members still in Xinjiang but the call was arranged by an Chinese officer who asked him for some information in exchange of updates about his sister. When the brother refused the officer told him “you need to cooperate if you want to see your mum”. After refusing, he has not been able to speak to his family again.
personal_details: Hayrigul loves dancing, singing and having parties with her friends. She also enjoys travelling, skiing and reading. She speaks Uyghur, Chinese, Russian, English and Turkish.

name: Shattyq Daulet
personal_details: Shattyq is described as outgoing and open in his communication with people. He is married with a daughter and a son aged 1 year and 1 month respectively and enjoyed ice skating.

name: Erkin Tursun
arrest_reason_official: Harbouring criminals, inciting national enmity or discrimination
arrest_reason_suspected: Nature of work, sending money to his son abroad
personal_details: Erkin founded and is the director of a school teaching children filmmaking, acting and journalism. Much of his work is focused on education but he also made long-running and award-winning television programmes. He likes to travel and took students around China to learn about science and journalism.

name: Ershidin Osman
personal_details: Ershidin likes to read and has a passion for gardening, keeping fruit trees and sheep. He is described by his sister as a hard worker who only took time off to visit with his seven children.

name: Ekpar Asat
personal_details: Ekpar speaks sign language and has done fundraising for sign language education. He loves football, tennis and dancing. He is described by his sister as very charismatic but humble.

name: Erkin Ayup
personal_details: Erkin likes reading, writing and gardening, and used to volunteer teaching doctors in a government disease prevention department. He is described by his brother as respected and a good problem-solver.

name: Alimu Hashani
personal_details: Alimu is described by his son as rigourous, responsible, honest and a respectful citizen. He is creative and enjoys playing music and painting.

name: Hawahan Osman
arrest_reason_suspected: Violation of birth policy, contact with husband abroad, teaching Arabic, reading the Koran
personal_details: Hawahan is described by her sister as smart and pretty with a very good memory. She is strong and likes physical labour. She has four children.

name: Ablat Mamat
personal_details: Ablat is very active and doesn't like to stay indoors for long. He is described by his brother as sociable and helpful. He is married and has a daughter.

name: Abduhalik Mettursun
personal_details: Abduhalik is a writer and publisher and has published more than 30 articles. He is described as sociable with good organisational skills. He is an organiser of book-related and other activities.

name: Ehet Sulaiman
arrest_reason_suspected: Family member abroad, being an editor at Radio Free Asia
personal_details: Ehet enjoys sports, gardening and housebuilding. He is described as sociable and very responsible with regard to his family. He is married and has two children.

name: Sajidugul
personal_details: Sajidugul likes reading and swimming and is described by her brother as sociable and helpful. She is married and has two children.

name: Refati Perat
personal_details: Refati studied geology and collects precious stones. He had planned to start an amber business with his brother-in-law. He has a son and a daughter.

name: Sadir Ali
personal_details: Sadir is described by his daughter as quiet, hardworking, very family-oriented and religious.

name: Suppiyem Tochti
arrest_reason_suspected: Travel to turkey, calling family abroad, religious practices
personal_details: Suppiyem worked a lot and often travelled on business. She owned a shop selling clothes, hats and assorted other items in Shahyar.

name: Nurmangul Abay
arrest_reason_official: Husband working abroad refused to return when ordered
personal_details: Nurmangul's husband describes her as a great mother, character and cook. She is also “very peaceful”, he said.

name: Ehmet Sulaiman
arrest_reason_suspected: Family member abroad, contact with foreigners
personal_details: Ehmet is an active and sociable person with a lot of friends. He likes to read, especially historical novels, and is described as open-minded.

name: Abidin Eyup
personal_details: Abidin is described by his niece as very nice and helpful. He likes to read and share his knowledge of Islam.

name: Hepisem Mehmet
arrest_reason_suspected: Sister lives abroad, brother studied abroad
personal_details: After her sister moved to Egypt at age 17, Hepisem went to work in her grandparents' shop. Her sister recalls them playing together as children. Hepisem is a great cook and makes traditional Uyghur dishes.

name: Rukiya Mohammed Amin
personal_details: Rukiya enjoys cooking and spending time with her two children.

name: Abdudesir Shukuri
profession: Dean, Institute of Literature, Xinjiang Normal University
arrest_reason_suspected: Being a scholar of Uyghur language and culture
personal_details: Abdudesir is described by his son as hardworking, talkative and humourous.

name: Abdureshid Tohti
arrest_reason_official: Disturbing social order, promoting terrorist activity
arrest_reason_suspected: Family members abroad, books in English and Turkish in the house
personal_details: Abdureshid is described as knowledgable and loves reading. He bought his daughter a lot of books when she was a child and dreamed of owning a bookstore.

name: Tajigul Qadir
arrest_reason_official: Disturbing social order, promoting terrorist activity
arrest_reason_suspected: Family members abroad, books in English and Turkish in the house
personal_details: Tajigul is described as a lovely, helpful person who is respected by her neighbours. She is a good cook and loves spending time with her children and grandchildren.

name: Ahmetjan Juma
arrest_reason_suspected: Being an intellectual, family member abroad
personal_details: Ahmetjan is described as loving, humble and handsome with great leadership qualities. He likes to read and write and to play music.
